CmdLine: apt-get update &&   apt-get install -y build-essential g++ flex bison gperf ruby perl   libsqlite3-dev libfontconfig1-dev libicu-dev libfreetype6 libssl-dev   libpng-dev libjpeg-dev &&   mkdir -p /srv/var &&   git clone https://github.com/rdpanek/phantomjs /srv/var/phantomjs &&   cd /srv/var/phantomjs &&   git ch -b yosemite && git pull origin yosemite &&   git l -5 &&   ./build.sh --confirm &&   ln -s /srv/var/phantomjs/bin/phantomjs /usr/bin/phantomjs &&   apt-get autoremove -y &&   apt-get clean all
Commands.Name: run
